## Source: kam193 (4202ead7b36e01a039c10a9379f617de02b50d5a69d5923652cfafb6f22067b6)
Package exfiltrates browser cookies and passwords, and starts a Telegram bot allowing re-exfiltrating later.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.


Campaign: 2026-01-codefrequencychecker


Reasons (based on the campaign):


 - exfiltration-browser-data


 - A Telegram webhook is used to send collected data.


 - infostealer
